creator: tkormann@apache.org
text:
I have just implemented the image-rendering and color-interpolation CSS 
properties in dynamic. I have tracked the calls, and everything is fine until 
GVT.

The problem seems to be that GraphicsUtil has a cached version of the image and 
changing the rendering hints on the RasterImageNode as no effect.

The samples/spec/tests/scripting/imageRendering.svg example can be used to 
debug.

initial hints were set on RasterImageNode but updates
were made to the ImageNode, so the RasterImageNode's hints from
create would hide the updated hints.
creator: deweese@apache.org
